  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-page-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-image banner-column"><div class="banner-image-bg" style="background-image: url(https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/default/files/styles/profile_footer/public/thumbnails/image/D_Salafia__82X6492_edited_0.jpg?itok=UHJvwhiB);"><!-- scald=1321:profile_footer --><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/default/files/styles/profile_footer/public/thumbnails/image/D_Salafia__82X6492_edited_0.jpg?itok=UHJvwhiB" width="850" height="510" alt="Student-carries-books" title="Student-carries-books" /><!-- END scald=1321 --></div></div><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/programs-study">Programs of Study</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Secondary Fields</h1><div class="field field-name-field-banner-teaser"><p>Secondary fields allow PhD students to broaden their course of study and enhance the professional reach of their degree.</p>
</div></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-page view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>PhD students interested in pursuing a secondary field take four or five graduate courses in a discipline, interdisciplinary area, or intellectually coherent subfield. The program offering the secondary field provides an intellectual rationale and outlines the package of courses required.</p>

<p>See the <em>GSAS Student Handbook</em> for <a href="http://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/secondary-fields">policy information and application instructions</a>.&nbsp;</p>

<h2>Secondary Fields Offered</h2>

<p>Students may pursue secondary fields in:</p>

<ul><li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/african-and-african-american-studies">African and African American Studies</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/american-studies">American Studies</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/anthropology">Anthropology</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/archaeology">Archaeology</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/celtic-medieval-languages-and-literatures">Celtic Medieval Languages and Literatures</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/classics">The&nbsp;Classics</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/comparative-literature">Comparative Literature</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/computational-science-and-engineering">Computational Science and Engineering</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/critical-media-practice">Critical Media Practice</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/film-and-visual-studies">Film and Visual Studies</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/german">German</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/historical-linguistics">Historical Linguistics</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/linguistic-theory">Linguistic Theory</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/medieval-studies">Medieval Studies</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/mind-brain-and-behavior">Mind, Brain, and Behavior</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/music">Music</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/romance-languages-and-literatures-french-italian-portuguese-or">Romance Languages and Literatures</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/science-technology-and-society">Science, Technology, and Society</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/studies-women-gender-and-sexuality">Studies of Women, Gender, and Sexuality</a></li>
</ul>
</div></div>

  </section>
                            	</div>
		</div><!-- /#content -->
                                
              </div><!-- /#main-content -->
        <div class="region region-content-closure">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div>
    <div  class="ds-2col-fluid node node-profile node-teaser view-mode-teaser clearfix">

  
      <div class="group-left">
      <div class="field field-name-field-main-image"><!-- scald=969:teaser {"link":"node\/236"} --><a href="/profiles/jim-yong-kim"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/default/files/styles/teaser/public/thumbnails/image/jim_yong_kim250.jpg?itok=sD8vAQOa" width="320" height="230" alt="Jim Yong Kim illustration" title="Jim Yong Kim illustration" /></a><!-- END scald=969 --></div>    </div>
  
      <div class="group-right">
      <div class="group-profile-header field-group-div"><div class="field field-name-profile-tag"><span>Alumni Profile</span></div></div><div class="field field-name-title"><a href="/profiles/jim-yong-kim">Jim Yong Kim</a></div><div class="field field-name-body">Throughout his career, Jim Yong Kim, MD ’91, PhD ’93, has had one mission: to improve the experiences of populations throughout the world. Beginning as a graduate student, when he and fellow student Paul Famer, MD ’88, PhD ’...<a href="/profiles/jim-yong-kim" class="more-link">Read more</a></div>    </div>
  
</div>

  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-block-4" class="block block-block plain last even">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

<p><a class="gmap-icon" href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/1350+Massachusetts+Ave,+Cambridge,+MA+02138/@42.3727139,-71.1210444,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89e37742dc1c29a7:0xc3dbda7a42311d03" title="Harvard University - The Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences on Google Map">MAP IT</a></p>

<p><span class="uppercase-label">TEL</span>617-495-5315<br><span class="uppercase-label">FAX</span>617-495-2928<br><span class="uppercase-label">EMAIL</span><a href="mailto:gsas@fas.harvard.edu">gsas@fas.harvard.edu</a></p>
    </div>

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>English Language Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The English Language Program (ELP) is a residential&nbsp;cultural immersion program offered every summer for incoming international graduate students. Run by the&nbsp;<a href="http://bokcenter.harvard.edu/">Derek Bok Center for Teaching and Learning</a>&nbsp;and GSAS, ELP will introduce you&nbsp;to life at Harvard and help you activate your English language skills. The program incorporates professional communication, an introduction to the cultural features of the American classroom, and community-building activities, with the ultimate goal of preparation for success in the Harvard academic and social environment. Through the program you will:</p>

<ul><li>Build an awareness of your own strengths and weaknesses in English</li>
	<li>Learn strategies you can use as you develop your professional communication skills</li>
	<li>Gain familiarity with all the resources available to you as a GSAS student</li>
	<li>Create lasting friendships and begin to feel at home here at Harvard</li>
</ul><p>ELP is aligned with the&nbsp;<a href="http://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/oral-english-language-requirement">GSAS Oral English Language Requirement</a>&nbsp;and is designed to feed directly into the Bok Center&rsquo;s&nbsp;<a href="http://bokcenter.harvard.edu/international-tfs">Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars</a>. &nbsp;</p>

<p><em>The ELP is generously supported by the Fan family: John Fan, PhD &rsquo;72, Stephanie Fan, and Melina Fan, PhD &rsquo;04. See <a href="https://alumni.harvard.edu/stories/elp-reception-2017">photos</a> from a recent celebration of ELP at Loeb House.</em></p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="/student-life/advice-new-students">English Language Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/english-language-proficiency">English Language Proficiency</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/international-students">International Students</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">

  </section>

<div id="block-block-4" class="block block-block plain last even">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

<p><a class="gmap-icon" href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/1350+Massachusetts+Ave,+Cambridge,+MA+02138/@42.3727139,-71.1210444,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89e37742dc1c29a7:0xc3dbda7a42311d03" title="Harvard University - The Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences on Google Map">MAP IT</a></p>

                <div class="content">
      <form action="/student-life/new-students/international-student-faq" method="post" id="search-block-form" accept-charset="UTF-8"><div><div class="container-inline form-wrapper" id="edit-inline"><div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-solr-keyword">

</div>

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>ESL Peer Consultation Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The Bureau of Study Counsel (BSC) offers an ESL Peer Consultation Program for international students who are interested in improving their English language oral skills. This program assists students to become:</p>

<ul><li>Effective learners in English</li>
	<li>Engaged participants in class discussions</li>
	<li>Effective oral presenters of intellectual ideas</li>
	<li>Fluent conversationalists in English</li>
	<li>Culturally aware members of the Harvard community</li>
</ul><p>This program pairs graduate students with undergraduates who will be available to meet with you on a regular basis. GSAS pays for up to 56&nbsp;meetings, which is more than one meeting per week for the entire academic&nbsp;year.</p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://bsc.harvard.edu/pages/esl-peer-consulting">ESL Peer Consultation Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/english-language-proficiency">English Language Proficiency</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/international-students">International Students</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->

  </section>

              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Exchange Scholar Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>GSAS participates in the Exchange Scholar Program, which allows graduate students to study and work with faculty for a term or an entire academic year&nbsp;at one of 10 other graduate schools:&nbsp;University of California at Berkeley, Brown University, University of Chicago, Columbia University, Cornell University, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, University of Pennsylvania, Princeton University, Stanford University, and Yale University.</p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://handbook.gsas.harvard.edu/exchange-scholar-program">Exchange Scholar Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/course-registration">Course Registration</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/research">Research</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Share This</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <div class="service-links"><a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/exchange-scholar-program&amp;t=Exchange%20Scholar%20Program" title="Share on Facebook" class="service-links-facebook" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/facebook.png" alt="Facebook logo" /></a> <a href="http://twitter.com/share?url=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/exchange-scholar-program&amp;text=Exchange%20Scholar%20Program" title="Share this on Twitter" class="service-links-twitter" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/twitter.png" alt="Twitter logo" /></a> <a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/forward?path=node/2152" title="Send to a friend" class="service-links-forward" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/forward.png" alt="Forward logo" /></a></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </section>

  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

<p><a class="gmap-icon" href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/1350+Massachusetts+Ave,+Cambridge,+MA+02138/@42.3727139,-71.1210444,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89e37742dc1c29a7:0xc3dbda7a42311d03" title="Harvard University - The Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences on Google Map">MAP IT</a></p>

<p><span class="uppercase-label">TEL</span>617-495-5315<br><span class="uppercase-label">FAX</span>617-495-2928<br><span class="uppercase-label">EMAIL</span><a href="mailto:gsas@fas.harvard.edu">gsas@fas.harvard.edu</a></p>

    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Harvard University Native American Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The Harvard University Native American Program&nbsp;brings together Native American, Alaska Native, and Native Hawaiian students and interested individuals from the Harvard community for the purpose of advancing the well-being of indigenous peoples through self-determination, academic achievement, and community service.</p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://hunap.harvard.edu/">Harvard University Native American Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/minority-students">Minority Students</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Share This</h2>
            <div class="content">

  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

<p><a class="gmap-icon" href="https://www.google.com/maps/place/1350+Massachusetts+Ave,+Cambridge,+MA+02138/@42.3727139,-71.1210444,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89e37742dc1c29a7:0xc3dbda7a42311d03" title="Harvard University - The Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences on Google Map">MAP IT</a></p>

<p><span class="uppercase-label">TEL</span>617-495-5315<br><span class="uppercase-label">FAX</span>617-495-2928<br><span class="uppercase-label">EMAIL</span><a href="mailto:gsas@fas.harvard.edu">gsas@fas.harvard.edu</a></p>

<div id="block-solr-search-block-solr-search-block" class="block block-solr-search-block last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <form action="/student-life/new-students/international-student-faq" method="post" id="search-block-form" accept-charset="UTF-8"><div><div class="container-inline form-wrapper" id="edit-inline"><div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-solr-keyword">
 <input type="text" id="edit-solr-keyword" name="solr_keyword" value="" size="60" maxlength="128" class="form-text" />
</div>
<div class="form-actions form-wrapper" id="edit-actions"><input type="submit" id="edit-submit" name="" value="Search" class="form-submit" /></div></div><input type="hidden" name="form_build_id" value="form-Bbbf7hAnI3w6I3fQIkEfNCJ4GiliaPncZBYsqO-TMHI" />

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Host Student Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The Host Student Program helps incoming international students feel welcome and comfortable as they make their transition to life in the United States and as graduate students at GSAS. The program links a continuing GSAS student with one or two incoming international students. Students may be matched in many ways&mdash;for example, by age, marital status or sexual orientation, country, field of study, interests or hobbies. We make every effort to match people with their preferences, depending on the students who volunteer to participate.</p>

<h4>Volunteer for the 2017 Host Student Program</h4>

<p>All current GSAS students, from both the United States and abroad, are invited to&nbsp;<a href="https://goo.gl/forms/P6VrBOl1nr2qMu4R2">apply to serve as host students</a>. As a host student, you are not expected to serve as a counselor or academic advisor, but rather as a person to whom a new international student can turn for support and friendly advice.</p>

<p>Matches will be made in early June. A Host Student Dinner is scheduled for Monday, August 21, 2017.</p>
</div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/dudley-house">Dudley House</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/international-students">International Students</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Share This</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <div class="service-links"><a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/host-student-program&amp;t=Host%20Student%20Program" title="Share on Facebook" class="service-links-facebook" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/facebook.png" alt="Facebook logo" /></a> <a href="http://twitter.com/share?url=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/host-student-program&amp;text=Host%20Student%20Program" title="Share this on Twitter" class="service-links-twitter" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/twitter.png" alt="Twitter logo" /></a> <a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/forward?path=node/2501" title="Send to a friend" class="service-links-forward" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/forward.png" alt="Forward logo" /></a></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </section>

                <div class="content">

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Hubway Bike Share Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>Travel across Boston, Cambridge, Somerville, and Brookline using the Hubway,&nbsp;publically shared bikes that&nbsp;can be returned to any of the 140+ stations across the network, including the 12 supported by Harvard.&nbsp;Harvard affiliates are eligible for a discounted annual membership.</p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://www.transportation.harvard.edu/commuterchoice/bike/hubway-bike-share-program">Hubway Bike Share Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/fitness">Fitness</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/perks-and-discounts">Perks and Discounts</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/transportation">Transportation</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Share This</h2>
            <div class="content">

  </section>

  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

<h3>Graduate School of Arts &amp; Sciences</h3>

<p>Richard A. and Susan F. Smith Campus Center<br>
1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <form action="/student-life/new-students/international-student-faq" method="post" id="search-block-form" accept-charset="UTF-8"><div><div class="container-inline form-wrapper" id="edit-inline"><div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-solr-keyword">
 <input type="text" id="edit-solr-keyword" name="solr_keyword" value="" size="60" maxlength="128" class="form-text" />
</div>
<div class="form-actions form-wrapper" id="edit-actions"><input type="submit" id="edit-submit" name="" value="Search" class="form-submit" /></div></div><input type="hidden" name="form_build_id" value="form-Bbbf7hAnI3w6I3fQIkEfNCJ4GiliaPncZBYsqO-TMHI" />

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>MBTA Semester Pass Program</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The MBTA Semester Pass Program provides bus, link, and commuter rail&nbsp;passes for the fall and spring terms, October through January&nbsp;and February through May. GSAS students can purchase semester MBTA bus, link, and commuter rail passes at a 50 percent discount by completing the MBTA Semester Pass order form online by the appropriate deadline. The cost of the semester pass will be charged to the student&rsquo;s term bill. Once available, student purchasers&nbsp;will receive an e-mail to&nbsp;pick up their passes&nbsp;in Cambridge or in the Longwood Medical Area.&nbsp;</p>

<p><a href="https://harvard.az1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_erg1q6W2Yc4iTDn">Order a Fall 2017 MBTA Semester Pass</a></p>

<p><strong>Deadline: 11:59 p.m. on Sunday, September 10,&nbsp;2017</strong></p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>

<p><strong>Semester Pass Program FAQs:</strong></p>

<p><strong>Q: What is the difference between a Zone1A and a Link pass? They cost the same.</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> The Link pass offers unlimited travel on subway and local bus. The Zone1A pass offers the same unlimited coverage as the Link pass with the addition of Zone1A commuter rail stops. See the <a href="http://www.mbta.com/fares_and_passes/rail/#zonechart">MBTA Commuter Rail Zone map</a> for more information. Students must pick up their next month&rsquo;s Zone1A pass towards the end of each month (ex. November&rsquo;s pass will be picked up at the end of October). Link passes are picked up once each semester. Lastly, lost Link passes may be replaced, whereas lost Zone1A passes may not be replaced; students would have to wait until the next month when they would pick up their next pass.</p>

<p><strong>Q: Can I pay for my pass with a check?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> No, all T-pass orders will be charged to the student&rsquo;s term-bill.</p>

<p><strong>Q: When and where can I pick my pass up?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> The Office of Student Affairs will be in touch when the passes are ready for pick-up. For the Fall program, pick-up will occur towards the end of September; for the Spring program, pick-up will occur towards the end of January. Students may pick up their passes in the location &ndash; Cambridge or Longwood &ndash; designated by them in their order form.</p>

<p><strong>Q: What happens if I lose my pass?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> Only bus and Link passes may be replaced by the MBTA. If you have lost a bus or Link pass, please contact the Office of Student Affairs (<a href="mailto:studaff@fas.harvard.edu">studaff@fas.harvard.edu</a>) and they will deactivate your lost pass and order a replacement pass on your behalf.</p>

<p><strong>Q: Is there summer T-pass coverage?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> No, the MBTA sets the parameters for the Semester Pass Program. The summer months are not part of the program.</p>

<p><strong>Q: Can I buy a pass just for a month?</strong></p>

<p><strong>A:</strong> No, the Semester Pass Program offers coverage for four consecutive months. Students are charged for the entire amount and cannot opt in or out of coverage during the semester.</p>
</div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/cambridge-and-boston">Cambridge and Boston</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/perks-and-discounts">Perks and Discounts</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/transportation">Transportation</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->

  <div class="field field-name-field-contact-info"><p>Questions about the <em>MBTA Semester Pass Program</em>?</p>

<p>E-mail: <a href="mailto:studaff@fas.harvard.edu">studaff@fas.harvard.edu</a><br>

                <div class="content">
      <form action="/student-life/new-students/international-student-faq" method="post" id="search-block-form" accept-charset="UTF-8"><div><div class="container-inline form-wrapper" id="edit-inline"><div class="form-item form-type-textfield form-item-solr-keyword">

  <div id="main">
    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars</h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>Run by the Derek Bok Center for Teaching and Learning, the Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars is a professional development resource for international graduate students, teachers, and scholars that offers programming and individual consultations on:</p>

<ul><li>Speaking and presentation skills (including English language proficiency)</li>
	<li>Teaching and learning in Harvard classrooms</li>
	<li>Intercultural communication</li>
</ul><p>&nbsp;</p>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://bokcenter.harvard.edu/international-tfs">Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/teaching">Teaching</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Share This</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <div class="service-links"><a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/professional-communication-program-international-teachers-and&amp;t=Professional%20Communication%20Program%20for%20International%20Teachers%20and%20Scholars" title="Share on Facebook" class="service-links-facebook" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/facebook.png" alt="Facebook logo" /></a> <a href="http://twitter.com/share?url=https%3A//gsas.harvard.edu/student-life/harvard-resources/professional-communication-program-international-teachers-and&amp;text=Professional%20Communication%20Program%20for%20International%20Teachers%20and%20Scholars" title="Share this on Twitter" class="service-links-twitter" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/twitter.png" alt="Twitter logo" /></a> <a href="https://gsas.harvard.edu/forward?path=node/2254" title="Send to a friend" class="service-links-forward" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://gsas.harvard.edu/sites/all/modules/contrib/service_links/images/forward.png" alt="Forward logo" /></a></div>    </div>

  </section>

              <h2 class="block__title block-title">Contact Us</h2>
            <div class="content">
      <h4>Harvard&nbsp;University</h4>

1350 Massachusetts Avenue, Suite 350<br>
Cambridge, MA 02138-3654</p>

    <div class="wrapper">
      <div id="banner">
          <div class="region region-highlighted">
    <div id="block-ds-extras-resource-banner" class="block block-ds-extras plain first last odd">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-banner"><div class="gray-banner"><div class="position-wrapper"><div class="gutter-wrapper"><div class="banner-text banner-column"><div class="wrapper"><nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/student-life">Student Life</a></li><li><a href="/student-life/resources" class="active">Resources</a></li></ol></nav><h1>Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars </h1></div></div></div></div></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
  </div>
      </div>
      <div id="main-content">
        <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
			<div class="wrapper">
          <div class="utilities">
      	          	              </div>
          <a id="main-content"></a>
                                <section class="region region-content">
      

<div  class="ds-1col node node-resource view-mode-full clearfix">

  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden" ><p>The Derek Bok Center for Teaching and Learning offers the Professional Communication Program for International Teachers and Scholars, which&nbsp;provides programming and individual consultations on:</p>

<ul><li>Speaking&nbsp;and presentation skills (including English language proficiency)</li>
	<li>Teaching&nbsp;and learning in Harvard classrooms</li>
	<li>Intercultural&nbsp;communication</li>
</ul>
</div><div class="field field-name-field-link"><a href="http://bokcenter.harvard.edu/international-tfs">Professional Communication Program</a></div></div>

<div id="block-ds-extras-resources-tagged-with" class="block block-ds-extras even">
  <div class="block-inner">
                <div class="content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-resource-topics field-type-entityreference field-label-inline clearfix" ><div class="label-inline">In</div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/english-language-proficiency">English Language Proficiency</a></div><div class="field-item"><a href="/student-life/harvard-resources/international-students">International Students</a></div></div>    </div>
  </div>
</div><!-- /.block -->
<div id="block-service-links-service-links" class="block block-service-links plain last odd">
